product_name: Shimano XT SM-RT81 Center-Lock Disc Rotor
long_description: The Shimano XT SM-RT81 Center-Lock Disc rotor optimizes precision and rigidity, and improves braking efficiency. Aluminum core lowers temperature when braking, slows long-term reduction in braking power and increases the life of brake pads. The Shimano XT SM-RT81 Center-Lock Disc rotor is compatible with Shimano disc brakes.
short_description: The Shimano XT SM-RT81 Center-Lock Disc rotor optimizes precision and rigidity, and improves braking efficiency.
